channel.description: Recent content in Fortune on FinanClub

item.title: LVS
item.description: score:-8 Chances: Las Vegas Sands has been named one of Fortune’s World’s Most Admired Companies in 2024, marking the company’s 10th appearance on the list. Strong recovery in Macao and Singapore operations is highlighted in the Q4 2023 earnings report. The company delivered earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended December 2023.
